description: T.A.M.A is a pocket-sized, lime-green creature whom befriends Di-air and terrorizes Ascoeur and Q-feuille when the trio are assigned to investigate the ruins of the GOTT headquarters. With Di-air`s kiss, he was able to gather remnants of nanotechnology to shape-shift into a Genetech Beast. The trio bring him back to the GTO headquarters where Di-air wears him as a necklace. Though they omit his presence from the debriefing, Hiver knows and does not disapprove.
name: T.A.M.A
